channel.title: Pages on IKMC
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on IKMC

item.title: Submit Your Content!
item.description: Hey! We at the IISER Kolkata Movie Club would love to hear what YOU have to say about cinema! On this form, you can submit content that you have created regarding anything and everything related to cinema. This includes, but is not limited to Movie Reviews Watch-lists (Subject / Film movement specific or otherwise) Movie Posters Blog-posts Short Films! If you want to put your content out there, we are here to help.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the IISER Kolkata Movie Club – your ticket to a cinematic adventure right here on campus! Whether you’re a die-hard film buff, a casual viewer, or someone who just loves the smell of popcorn, our club is the perfect place for you. We screen everything from classic masterpieces and indie gems to the latest blockbusters and thought-provoking documentaries. Our club is more than just a place to watch movies; it’s a community of passionate cinephiles.
